typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as decimal(38,0),
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as decimal(38,0),
		Rating as decimal(38,0),
		RottenTomato as decimal(38,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(genresArray = split(genres,'|')) ~> CreateArray
CreateArray sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
